roleset.name: wedding ceremony
roleset.note: NUPTIALS-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. Slight comparison with ceremony.01. Framed by Katie (from nuptials.01-n)

role.descr: entity being married, or first marriage partner mention

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: "It was really cool, " said Lora Dal Bo of her nuptials with her partner, Gina Dal Bo.
example.arg: with her partner, Gina Dal Bo.
